title: Did the deceased have any living descendants at the time of their death?
question: Did {deceasedName} have any living descendants at the time of their death?
paragraph2: This includes anyone who was legally adopted (either in or out of {deceasedName}’s family), but not any step-children or their descendants.

anyLivingDescendants.required: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} has any living children, grandchildren or great-grandchildren
